conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the baffles to predict which container it will flow into.

The liquid will flow from point A through the baffles.
Determine the path of the liquid through the baffles from A to B, then to C.
Predict the path of the liquid through the baffles to flow into the container directly below C.
Identify the container directly below point C.
Since point C is directly below point B, the container the liquid will flow into is D.
